General.Name: Jiangsu Phoenix Publishing & Media Corp Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Phoenix Publishing & Media Corporation Limited engages in the editing, publishing, and distribution of books, newspapers, electronic publications, and audio-visual products in China. The company also engages in the publication and distribution of teaching materials; distribution of general books and sale of teaching equipment; logistics distribution; and the cultural and commercial real estate operation and other businesses. In addition, it operates a chain of bookstores; and sells its products through e-commerce, direct sales, and other methods of distribution. Further, the company provides data related IT services, comprising computer room leasing, bandwidth operation, and cloud services; film and television related production, distribution, and related services, as well as artist brokerage services; and teaching software, such as early childhood, basic, and vocational education, as well as virtual training software and network platform. Additionally, it engages in the research, development, and sale of educational apps; development and operation of mobile games; and act as an agent of products of other mobile game companies. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Yunxiang  Xu
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
